Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Kimball
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Kimball due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Kimball due to signal problems.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 74th/Ashland
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Ashland, 76th, Damen and the Terminal: due to street blockage near 74th/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Ashland, 76th, Damen and the Terminal: due to street blockage near 74th/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
